short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UX & UI improvements to the FastMail web client

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The FastMail web client is fantastic, but has a few usability issues that could be improved:

- Common keyboard shortcuts are not intuitive
- The editor does not properly support indented text
- Switching accounts takes too many clicks

Better FastMail adds a bunch of intuitive keyboard shortcuts for:

- List navigation
- List selection
- Archiving
- Folders
- Indentation

As well as better UI and functionality for:

- Editor indenting
- Folder tree
- Switch user

See the home page for more detailed information.
